summary: Twenty craftable and upgradable silver weapons
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]This mod adds silver weapons to craftimg list of smithing forge.The list consists of both vanilla silver weapons and unique ones.
Every item has Silver Perk meaning it is specially effective againts lycanthropies and undead.
To smith them you need Advanced Smithing perk.

The following silver weapons are craftable :
- Silver Dagger
- Silver Ceremonial Dagger
- Silver Stiletto
- Silver Sword Var.I
- Silver Sword Var.II
- Silver Sword Var.III
- Silver Sword Var.IV
- Silver Sword Var.V
- Silver Longsword Var.I
- Silver Longsword Var.II
- Silver Longsword Var.III
- Silver Claymore
- Silver Short Sword
- Silver Battleaxe
- Silver Bow
- Silver War Axe

The file [i][u][b]Oriental Silver Set ,[/b][/u][/i]amongst named above adds also following weapons :
- Silver Wakizashi
- Silver Tanto
- Silver Katana
- Silver Scimitar
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]- Silver Nodachi[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][i]
[b][u]Credits :[/u][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70391]DMagnus[/url] for Stiletto
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71933]ClipsyMoon[/url] for Ceremonial Dagger
Oaristys for Swords
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3871/]747823[/url] for Scimitars,Katana,Axes and Swords
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945?tab=user+files&BH=1]Insanity[/url] for Bow
Elvar for Short Sword and Dagger
DarkGondul for Claymore

[/i]For more immersive experience I reccomend an mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60018]Silver Weapon Replacer[/url]
which replaces the two vanilla swords with better ones.[/size][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
